thread.title: As GOP Falls Apart, President's Approval Rating Hits Two-Year High
thread.title_full: As GOP Falls Apart, President's Approval Rating Hits Two-Year High

author: Susie Madrak
title: As GOP Falls Apart, President's Approval Rating Hits Two-Year High
text:
stephen byrne • 39 sec ago 
I wouldn't know about what churches do. I don't belong to a church. Maybe churches separate a fool and his money, but they've never separated me from my money. Bartenders do that. And you don't love this. You hate this but can't bring yourself to admit it. That's why you get so angry when I tell you Jesus loves you. But you know, your grammar seems to have improved, so I guess it hasn't been a waste of my time. And Jesus loves you. east is east • 54 sec ago 
Perhaps Bush will move up once the lunatics flame out he has run an unbelievably awful campaign and has been owned by Trump twelve times now. I don't think Republicans can vote for a guy who has been beat up that many times by the playground bully. posted on Senator Explains Fiorina's Tumble In The Polls KietaZou • 1 min ago 
Hey! I heard a POLICE OFFICER was shot dead in New York! Doesn't that require all this "Black Lives Matter" stuff be immediately and permanently suspended? 
Oh, the huge manatee! posted on Black Drummer Shot By Plainclothes Officer After His Car Breaks Down NotReveen • 1 min ago 
Under normal circumstances they wouldn't, but if they can get a chairmanship or two out of the deal, who knows. There was talk last month that Democrats would vote to save John Boehner's speakership. This isn't a far step from that. Blue Lensman • 1 min ago 
If there was originally some seed of a good idea in there somewhere, it's long gone now.
